ComicInfo.Summary:
After Angelica and Jenny are taken hostage by the hosts of the creepy masquerade party, they wonder what's in store for them next. But nothing could prepare them for the sadistic auction that is about to take place. With little time and up against a room full of monsters, Angelica must figure a way out of her impossible situation before it's too late. The action-packed finale of HELLCHILD: Blood Money is here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Renato Rei & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | D | Cover D | Eric J & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Virgo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | F | Quarterly Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | G | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Sabine Rich | Missing |
